      • moveEntity

        public Entity moveEntity(Map map,
                         Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> state)
        Since DK does not move, this is used to know which sprite to represent it
        Specified by:
        moveEntity in class Entity
        Parameters:
        map - Current map of the game
        state - State of DK, first if it is a falling barrel or rolling to throw, second if it is the first barrel
        Returns:
        null if DK is about to throw a barrel, this object otherwise
